mapper.select: select i.* , (select d.valueName from data_dictionary d where d.valueId = i.status and d.typeCode = 'APP_STATUS') as statusName, (select d.valueName from data_dictionary d where d.valueId = i.flatformId and d.typeCode = 'APP_FLATFORM') as flatformName, (select c.categoryName from app_category c where c.id = i.categoryLevel1) as categoryLevel1Name, (select c.categoryName from app_category c where c.id = i.categoryLevel2) as categoryLevel2Name, (select c.categoryName from app_category c where c.id = i.categoryLevel3) as categoryLevel3Name from app_info i where i.id = #{id}
